message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,400,000 is fair.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the value of the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but $1,200,000 is significantly below its true value.  I'm willing to negotiate, so how about we meet in the middle at $1,300,000?
I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so how about we try $1,250,000?
